contents.text: Welcome to Anaplan, where connected planning accelerates your business decisions.
For sales and product demonstrations, press 1.
To speak with a sales representative, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Get a quick overview of enterprise pricing tiers
I need to speak with a sales representative about Anaplan solutions for my veteran-owned logistics startup.
I need to speak with a sales representative to discuss enterprise licensing tiers and API quota limits.
I’d like to speak with a sales representative to understand your planning solution better.
I’d like to speak with a sales representative about academic pricing and group licensing for my university physics lab.

contents.text: To schedule a product demonstration, press 2.
Please hold while we schedule your product demonstration.

navigationGoals: Book a live demonstration of the Anaplan platform for next week
I’d like to schedule a demo of Anaplan for my small business planning team.
I want to schedule a product demonstration focused on Anaplan’s predictive analytics API integration.
I need to schedule a live demonstration of the product so someone can walk me through it.
I want to schedule a product demo focused on using Anaplan for managing lab resources and experiment planning.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a failing data import in my planning model
I’m a former service member using Anaplan and need help troubleshooting a technical issue.
I need technical support to troubleshoot REST API authentication failures in my CI/CD pipeline.
I’m having trouble with the software and need to connect with technical support for help.
I need technical support configuring the API to import my experimental data sets into Anaplan.

contents.text: For billing and account inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Verify and update my monthly subscription invoice details
I have a question about my Anaplan subscription billing as a veteran small business owner.
I have questions about my invoice and usage-based billing for data storage overages.
I have questions about my recent bill and need to speak to someone in billing about my account charges.
I have a question about my student subscription invoice and need to update my billing information.
